title: Whipping Spray (MGS)
description: Ordinary office worker Baek Hweesoo has a physical constitution that is not quite so ordinary. Whenever he reaches climax, he ejaculates an unbelievable amount. One day, while minding his business and quietly resigning himself to the fact that his unusual issue will be a lifelong complex, he learns something. Pardon? He is the human with the strongest vital force on Earth and the only one who can save a malnourished incubus prince from imminent doom? With that, Hweesoo sets off for the demon realm where lies Prince Amon, who has been asleep for nearly 100 years. In return for waking him from his perpetual slumber and feeding him until he is full, Hweesoo has been promised a full recovery for Pancake, his companion cat who has cancer. Can Hweesoo really save both Amon and Pancake with his peculiar pecker?
author: Nutty
